user.title: Gecko Hot Tub Setup
user.description:
To get your OAuth tokens:

1. Open browser developer tools (F12)
2. Go to Network tab
3. Visit https://app.geckoalliance.com and login
4. Look for request to 'oauth/token' in Network tab
5. Copy the complete JSON response
6. Paste it below

The integration will automatically discover your hot tub details.
